Class Card

java.lang.Object
Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sellable
public class Card extends Object implements Sellable
Represents a trading card with a name, rarity, variant, value, and count. The card's value is automatically adjusted based on its variant.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(String name, CardRarity rarity, CardVariant variant, BigDecimal value, int count)
      Constructs a new Card with the given attributes.

      If the rarity is not RARE or LEGENDARY, the variant is automatically set to NORMAL. The value is adjusted based on the variant using a multiplier.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card
      rarity - the rarity of the card
      variant - the variant of the card (may be overridden based on rarity)
      value - the base value of the card (must be > 0)
      count - the initial card count (must be >= 0)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if value ≤ 0 or count invalid input: '<' 0
